https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/elect._instruction: Add one or several electrical contacts of this electrode.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/elect.description: Not shielded part of a conductor that is used to establish electrical contact with a nonmetallic part of a circuit.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/elect.label: Electrode contact
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/elect.name: electrodeContact

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this electrode within the file it is stored in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.name: internalIdentifier
